TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday:.Back To The Future Train!

Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/041caa78de6e28c0c93aa7e30fac66cd/tumblr_inline_nw8ev7iJ4r1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/master_hellish/v/20107637">http://www.twitch.tv/master_hellish/v/20107637</a><br/></p><p>Master_Hellis created a flying train! You have to see this creative and get surprised with the result. #KSP<br/><br/></p>

Not the first (there are at least 5 on Kerbalx), but still a very nice job.

Kudos to Master_Hellis
The fact that he's got an ice cream cone just makes this even better XD
